meanings.sent1: The landlord subinfeuded a small portion of his property to the tenant.
meanings.sent2: She subinfeuded the farmland to her cousin for cultivation.
meanings.sent3: The farmer subinfeuded the backyard to the chickens for a coop.
meanings.sent4: The king subinfeuded the castle to the loyal knight for protection.
meanings.sent5: The teacher subinfeuded the classroom to the students for group projects.

meanings.sent1: He subinfeuded the cottage from the landlord for a year.
meanings.sent2: They subinfeuded the warehouse for storage purposes.
meanings.sent3: The family subinfeuded the garden shed for their gardening tools.
meanings.sent4: She subinfeuded the garage to keep her car safe from the elements.
meanings.sent5: The company subinfeuded the office space for their employees to work in.
